# description

**Instance Property**

A textual description of the time zone including the name, abbreviation, offset from GMT, and whether or not daylight saving time is currently in effect.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing Time Zones

- **localizedName(_:locale:)**: Returns the localized name of the time zone.

items.description: Returns the localized name of the time zone.
items.name: localizedName(_:locale:)
